description:
GPS Ultimate is full feature GPS Software in a phone. In fact, it's functionality rivals many stand-alone high-priced GPS units! The app provides the following navigation tools: 
1. GPS Controlled Directional Compass. 
2. Waypoint Compass. A second GPS controlled compass that points to your waypoint and adjusts as you travel. 
3. Waypoint Management System with an Editable Waypoint Database. Enter an unlimited number of waypoints. 
4. Waypoint Navigation Mode- Allows you to navigate to any of your waypoints. Simply follow the Waypoint Compass to your destination. 

5. Altimeter and Speedometer. (Altitude and speed)
6. Odometer. (Total Distance Traveled). 
7. Delta Altitude for total ascent and descent. 
8. Heading and Distance to Waypoint. 
9. Estimated Time of Arrival.
10. Trail Tracing. Traces your trail. View your trail in real time or store it for review later. Your trail map is scalable from 1 x 1.5 miles to 80 x 120 miles. Map also pans vertically and horizontally. Pan and Zoom in any combination. 
11. Continuous Tracking & Power Saver Modes. 
12. Unit Conversion functions with a tap of the finger. 
13. A Satellite Signal Transmission Rate Interpreter is dynamically linked to your speed to reduce the effect of location uncertainty on odometer readings. 
14. All of the GPS Ultimate features do not require phone or internet service. Even the trail tracer feature operates independently and does not require phone or internet. All that is required is a view of the sky.
versionNote: Added option to prevent screen from dimming.
